name: Battle Dragon
description:
! THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS !

This was part of a series of 1 game a month I was planning to do this year, but this game really made me proud and there were so many things I wanted to do but couldn't because of the deadline, one month wasn't enough for me to make something that would me me really proud.

Still I'm putting it for sale, because I will probably make it more expensive as I add more features and more levels, so if you buy now, you'll get a very cool game for an "early acces" price.

Please feel free to suggest anything here in the comments, I can't promise to please everyone but I'll try to add the things that I find to be fitting for this game.

Any old arcade beat'em up fans out there
